trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A> property to determine which cell changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A>屬性來判斷哪一個儲存格的變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> property to determine which cell state changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>屬性來判斷哪一個儲存格狀態變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the parameter values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用參數值來初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs.Cell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that has a changed state.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref>數值，指出已變更的資料格的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that has a changed state.
Gets the state that has changed on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格上的已變更的狀態。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref>數值，指出已變更的資料格的狀態。
